subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The United States national team completed plans to play Argentina in an exhibition game June 8 at Giants Stadium in East Rutherford, N.J. The American team will play games at England on May 28 and at Spain on June 4. It will begin World Cup qualifying against Barbados on June 15 at Carson, Calif.
